Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee Bucks have a 1-3 record to start the year, featuring stars Giannis Antetokounmpo and Damian Lillard.
Memphis Grizzlies have a 2-3 record and recently got Ja Morant back but are expected to be without several key rotation pieces.
The Bucks are 6.5-point road favorites as of Thursday morning with a total set at 232.
